urls.description: We connect charging ne tworks all over Europe. We offer market opportunities to market players in the field of electric mobility and make it even easier for every individual driver to cross borders. Our open platform connects the back offices of our partners, in order to turn Europe into one big charging network. e-clearing.net is an open platform that enables the exchange of roaming authorization, charge transaction and charge point information data. We offer market players in electric mobility cross-borde
urls.title: e-clearing.net GmbH

1731621766278086817.text: @BitlagerPro Wir nehmen an allen E-Roaming-Plattformen (Hubject, https://t.co/gSHQpg8s1X, Gireve) teil. Alle Ladepunkte, die über diese Plattformen angeschlossen sind, sind im EnBW HyperNetz nutzbar. (1/2)
